title: How to Make a Breakfast with Apples and Cornstarch

steps.headline: Put water in a pot and bring to a boil.
Add a clove and 2-3 cinnamon sticks to the water.
Peel and grate one or two apples.
steps.description: You will need one average-sized apple for every two people.

steps.headline: Let the water come to a rolling boil.
steps.description: Add the grated apple to the water, along with some sugar.

steps.headline: Leave the apple to cook for 6 to 10 minutes.
Mix the cornstarch with a little bit of cold water in a cup.
steps.description: Add 3 spoonfuls per liter (quart) of water.

steps.headline: Add the cornstarch to the boiling water and leave it to boil for another 5 minutes.

text: Put water in a pot and bring to a boil.  Add a clove and 2-3 cinnamon sticks to the water.  Peel and grate one or two apples. You will need one average-sized apple for every two people. Let the water come to a rolling boil. Add the grated apple to the water, along with some sugar. Leave the apple to cook for 6 to 10 minutes.  Mix the cornstarch with a little bit of cold water in a cup. Add 3 spoonfuls per liter (quart) of water. Add the cornstarch to the boiling water and leave it to boil for another 5 minutes.  Breakfast is ready!  Finished.
